data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, and affection status of participants with or without cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Center for Common Disease Genomics (CCDG) - Cardiovascular: Emory Cohort" project.

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Is subject a case or control for coronary artery disease [case=Subjects with coronary artery disease; control=Subjects without coronary artery disease]
